import { executeUseCase } from '@server/Application/Adapters/ExecuteUseCase';
import {
  Get{{EntityName}}s,
  Get{{EntityName}},
  Register{{EntityName}},
  Delete{{EntityName}},
  Update{{EntityName}},
} from './';
import {
  IGet{{EntityName}}s,
  IGet{{EntityName}},
  IRegister{{EntityName}},
  IDelete{{EntityName}},
  IUpdate{{EntityName}},
  {{EntityName}},
} from '../Domain';
import { IPaginationResponse } from '@server/Application';

export class {{EntityName}}sService {
  constructor(
    private readonly _get{{EntityName}}s: Get{{EntityName}}s,
    private readonly _get{{EntityName}}: Get{{EntityName}},
    private readonly _register{{EntityName}}: Register{{EntityName}},
    private readonly _delete{{EntityName}}: Delete{{EntityName}},
    private readonly _update{{EntityName}}: Update{{EntityName}},
  ) {}

  async get{{EntityName}}s({
    input,
    requestContext,
  }: IGet{{EntityName}}s): Promise<IPaginationResponse<{{EntityName}}[]>> {
    return executeUseCase({ useCase: this._get{{EntityName}}s, input, requestContext });
  }

  async get{{EntityName}}({ input, requestContext }: IGet{{EntityName}}): Promise<{{EntityName}}> {
    return executeUseCase({
      useCase: this._get{{EntityName}},
      input,
      requestContext,
    });
  }

  async register{{EntityName}}({ input, requestContext }: IRegister{{EntityName}}): Promise<{{EntityName}}> {
    return executeUseCase({
      useCase: this._register{{EntityName}},
      input,
      requestContext,
    });
  }

  async update{{EntityName}}({ input, requestContext }: IUpdate{{EntityName}}): Promise<number> {
    return executeUseCase({
      useCase: this._update{{EntityName}},
      input,
      requestContext,
    });
  }

  async delete{{EntityName}}({ input, requestContext }: IDelete{{EntityName}}): Promise<number> {
    return executeUseCase({
      useCase: this._delete{{EntityName}},
      input,
      requestContext,
    });
  }
}
